pr_title: CLDR-10338 add u locale extension -dx, disable dictionary break for listed scripts

timeline.bodyText:
Change this to reference a valid Unicode script subtag
(maybe also other places if you have time)
timeline.author: macchiati
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2369,6 +2369,29 @@

Unknown or Invalid Currency.

+ + A Unicode Dictionary Break Exclusion Identifier + specifies scripts to be excluded from dictionary-based text break (for words and lines). + The valid values are of one or more items of type SCRIPT_CODE as specified in the + name attribute value in the type + element of key name="dx" in bcp47/segmentation.xml. + + + "dx" + Dictionary break script exclusions + + ISO 15924 script code + + +

Items of type SCRIPT_CODE, which are codes consisting of 4 ASCII letters

replies.bodyText: Thanks, I did make that change
replies.author: pedberg-icu

timeline.message: CLDR-10338 add u locale extension -dx, disable dictionary break for listed scripts

timeline.bodyText: The anchor names (id=...) in the spec use a variety of styles, but underscores seem common. Do we care?
timeline.author: markusicu
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2369,6 +2369,29 @@

Unknown or Invalid Currency.

+ + A

replies.bodyText: At least in this table, id values specified as a category are italicized, while explicit values are quoted and non-italic. So this follows that style.
replies.author: pedberg-icu

replies.bodyText:
I am talking about the anchor text id="UnicodeDictionaryBreakExclusionIdentifier", not the CSS style of the presentation.
Other anchors use underscores (id="Unicode_Dictionary_Break_Exclusion_Identifier"), lowercase, etc.
replies.author: markusicu

replies.bodyText:
The camel-case style seems to be used for all of the other id anchors in this table, so I just followed that... e.g.
#UnicodeCurrencyFormatIdentifier
#UnicodeCollationIdentifier
#UnicodeCurrencyIdentifier
#UnicodeEmojiPresentationStyleIdentifier
#UnicodeFirstDayIdentifier
...
replies.author: pedberg-icu

timeline.bodyText: Add that in that case it needs to be the only code?
timeline.author: markusicu
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2369,6 +2369,29 @@

Unknown or Invalid Currency.

+ + A Unicode Dictionary Break Exclusion Identifier + specifies scripts to be excluded from dictionary-based text break (for words and lines). + The valid values are of one or more items of type SCRIPT_CODE as specified in the + name attribute value in the type + element of key name="dx" in bcp47/segmentation.xml. + + + "dx" + Dictionary break script exclusions + + unicode_script_subtag values + + +

One or more items of type SCRIPT_CODE, which are valid + unicode_script_subtag values.

+

The code Zyyy (Common) can be specified to exclude all scripts.

replies.bodyText: Good point, I will update to indicate this.
replies.author: pedberg-icu

timeline.message: CLDR-10338 add u locale extension -dx, disable dictionary break for listed scripts
CLDR-10338 add u locale extension -dx, disable dictionary break for listed scripts
